name: AppStarter
description: A versatile starter template for building SaaS applications, AI agents, portfolios, and landing pages. Features modern UI with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui, Better Auth integration, and Cloudflare Workers backend with Hono and Drizzle ORM.
features: Beautiful landing page with hero, features, and CTA sections
Polished sign-in and sign-up forms with validation
Token-based theming with Tailwind CSS variables
target_audience: Web developers and product teams building modern SPAs with authentication on Cloudflare.
visual_theme: Clean, modern landing page with a professional design system. Uses OKLCH color palette, rounded corners, subtle shadows, and accessible components. Fully responsive with smooth transitions.
functionality: Complete authentication flow with Better Auth, beautiful landing page for first impressions, client-side routing, form validation with Zod, and a Cloudflare Workers backend (Hono) with protected API routes and CORS support.
